content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts items into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient materials for crafting
- Ensure you have enough required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need both iron plates and iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting items without required machines
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the item you are trying to craft.
